name: Android John
description: It is 2070. A company specialized in robotics has developed artificial intelligence AJ version 1.0. It is the first stable version since the beginning of this project. Without hesitation the company launched the first trial of its operating system.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel 4000 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 850 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 Processor: 3.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA 470 GTX or greater DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 850 MB available space
